entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone Harry wants to have followed.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who responds to Harry's call in the darkness.

relationships.description: Harry was injured by Professor Lockhart, as mentioned in the text: 'all the bones had been removed from his arm by the incurably inept Professor Lockhart'.
Harry wants to have Malfoy followed, as mentioned in the text: 'He had the solution at last: there was a way to have Malfoy followed'.
Harry calls Kreacher in the darkness, as mentioned in the text: 'Quietly , tentatively , Harry spoke into the darkness. ‘Kreacher?’'.
